about_the_game:
Delta Light 2 is my love letter to the old school flash games that I grew up on.

With this sequel, I set out to build on everything that made the original special, while leaving behind what didn’t quite hit the mark. Delta Light 2 brings together the two core game modes: Campaign and Infinite Mode.

Campaign and Infinite Mode

In the Campaign, you’ll explore a series of handcrafted maps, each with unique mobs and challenges. I’m especially excited for you to encounter my many new bosses. To give you moments to breathe, I’ve added visual novel elements ;)

Once the Campaign ends, you seamlessly continue in Infinite Mode—a (mostly) procedural generated campaign that endlessly challenges. Using your Steam Id to make sure you, and only you get to play this game like you do.

The mob pool of Delta Light 2 is insanely deep in comparison to the first. With almost every campaign map featuring new mobs. This variety does not only ensures that each level presents fresh challenges but also feeds the Infinite Mode with content.

Fruit Pickups

The power-ups from the first game are back,

The tasty fruit pickup from the first game are back too! As you play, you’ll find healthy snacks to boost your stats. Stack the powers of Cherries, Melons, Bananas, and more.

Unlockable characters

I also brought back some of the most beloved characters from the first game while cutting out the noise to focus on what makes Delta Light shine. With a brand-new engine powering the game (thanks Bixxy), the graphics are bolder, the musics are an mix of arcade and chip-tune tunes (thanks Rolemusic), and the game-play is way less repetitive.

Delta Light 2 is the game I always dreamed Delta Light could be. I poured my heart into it, and I hope you’ll feel that passion when you play.

I love making games—and I hope you’ll love playing this one. 💖

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Luminoveau engine compatible graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Luminoveau compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Steam Deck: This game is not officially supported, but it should run using the latest Proton Experimental.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Luminoveau engine compatible graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Luminoveau compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Steam Deck: This game is not officially supported, but it should run using the latest Proton Experimental.

short_description: Delta Light 2 is my love letter to classic flash games! With new arcade graphics, a fresh engine, and a killer soundtrack. Explore + 35 handcrafted maps in the Campaign. then dive into Infinite Mode. With fruity power-ups and a set of unlock-able characters, this is Delta Light like never before!
